lead_paragraph: Eden Hazard said he was 99 percent sure to stay at Chelsea next season, and he relishing a chance to go up against new Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho.

headline.print_headline: Hazard Relishing Chance to Go Up Against Mourinho
headline.main: Hazard Relishing Chance to Go Up Against Mourinho

snippet: Eden Hazard said he was 99 percent sure to stay at Chelsea next season, and he relishing a chance to go up against new Manchester United manager Jose Mourinho....
